backend/main.mo: Defines a canister actor with suit stats, module toggles, environmental hazard structures, and system state records with initial values.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing UI layout, tabs, HUD components, state stores, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the HUD interface.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root mount node and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling boot sequence, display modes, tab navigation, and tactical mode safety logic.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Implements a centralized audio bus for SFX and voice playback with unlock logic for browser autoplay restrictions.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: Provides HEV-style voice announcement helpers that trigger audio cues based on system and module events.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: Provides helper functions to play various UI sound effects when voice is enabled.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: Implements an ambience audio player with playlist controls, volume, looping, and custom track uploads.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Runs a staged boot-up animation with typed text, audio cues, and a fade-out before signaling completion.
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Displays environmental hazard levels with icons, labels, and status-based styling.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudGlobalEff: Renders global HUD visual effects like bloom, critical overlay, and presence glow with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: Defines the main HUD container with theming, orientation handling, effects, and header/footer structure.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Shows an overlay indicating the HUD system is offline with guidance to restore it.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Renders a minimal HUD showing key stats and a button to restore the full HUD mode.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Contains reusable HUD panel components including stat panels, meter panels, and vitals display.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Wraps the tactical HUD layout, showing system readouts and stat panels while injecting child content in the center.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Renders a standalone tactical overlay with frames, a reticle, and fixed system readout labels.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Implements an interactive command console with history navigation, command execution, and log updates.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Provides a confirmation dialog with customizable text and sound effects for confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Displays subsystem statuses and toggles suit settings, with confirmations and log entries for critical actions.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Shows timestamped system log entries inside a scrollable area.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Displays a medical diagram image with colored overlays reflecting health and armor values.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Generates detailed medical stats and assessments based on suit and hazard state values.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: Canvas radar component that animates a sweep line and draws deterministic contacts with visual effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHudPresence.ts: Tracks pointer and touch activity to update CSS variables for HUD effects using throttled animation frames.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity, and exposing login state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Set of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating stats and module states through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Detects the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting and returns a boolean.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: Detects whether the viewport is in landscape orientation using matchMedia and resize/orientation listeners.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind and custom CSS defining theme variables, animations, HUD styles, and interaction behaviors.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Parses text commands to modify suit, hazard, and info settings state, logging actions and returning status messages.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Defines a set of monochrome Unicode glyphs for hazard and status indicators.
frontend/src/lib/weaponsData.ts: Provides interfaces and a dataset describing melee, ranged, and magic weapons with stats, ammo, and fire-rate options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Zustand store managing audio playback, playlist handling, volume, looping, and custom track uploads.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Monitors hazard levels to trigger critical flashing and voice alerts with throttling.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Zustand store tracking individual hazard levels with utilities for aggregate status and reset.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Manages HUD and info settings including display mode, voice, color scheme, and UI scaling.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Zustand store for suit stats and module toggles with setters and reset functionality.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Provides a log store for timestamped system entries with add and clear operations.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Stores and toggles UI landscape mode state with reset support.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Tracks selected weapon, ammo type, and fire rate with simple setters and reset.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: Renders core suit stats, hazards, and vitals panels using current suit state.
frontend/src/tabs/HazardsTab.tsx: Renders hazard monitoring UI with filtering, trends, environmental stats, and expandable hazard details using store data.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: Displays subsystem readouts, system logs, and a command console in structured panels.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: Shows medical system readouts via the MedicalReadouts component.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides UI and system configuration controls, including display mode, HUD settings, voice, and system reset.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Shows tactical radar, readouts, and contact list within HUD panels.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: Manages suit module toggles and ambience playback with audio feedback.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: Displays weapon loadouts, selection UI, and detailed stats for the chosen weapon.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, borders, typography, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s metadata, required weapon images, architectural notes, and lists existing and new feature requests focused on expanding and organizing the Weapons tab’s static frontend data and UI.
